Our Head of Care Douglas Twenefour clarifies the main points to be aware of with Wegovy

Our Head of Care Douglas Twenefour clarifies the main points to be aware of with Wegovy.

New research is underway to evaluate how weight loss drugs like Ozempic impact not only the reduction of body weight but also their potential effects on overall health, metabolic processes, and long-term sustainability as part of comprehensive weight management strategies.
